DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigates the influence of oral ketoconazole on the pharmacokinetics and safety of BI 144807.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability of BI 144807 Given Alone and in Combination With Ketoconazole in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
